title: Slow to unlock Pixel 3a since March 2020 update.
content:
Since the March 2020 security update, my Pixel 3a is really slow to unlock.
When I restart the device, the problem  disappears, but comes back progressively.

I saw a similar post, apparently the guy tackled the problem by updating the Carriere Services, but I'm up date and my problem is still here.

If you have had the same problem or/and know the solution, please share it.
